cells.data:
-- scanr :: (b -> a -> b) -> b -> [a] -> [b]
on scanr(f, startValue, xs)
    tell mReturn(f)
        set v to startValue
        set lng to length of xs
        set lst to {startValue}
        repeat with i from lng to 1 by -1
            set v to |Î»|(v, item i of xs, i, xs)
            set end of lst to v
        end repeat
        return reverse of lst
    end tell
end scanr
